Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.description: Map used as the study area for estimating population polygon hypotheses (e.g., study area, species distribution model).
Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.label: grid_map

Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.description: Occurrence points of the species within the study area, used to calculate the distance map.
Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.label: occ_points

Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.description: Maximum known dispersal distance of the species in meters. If available, it is added as an additional hypothesis for defining population polygons; otherwise, hypotheses are estimated based on quantiles from the distance map values.
Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.label: DispersalDistance_m

Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.description: Map showing the calculated distances from occurrence points within the study area.
Pops_from_DispDist>Pops_from_DispDist.ym.label: distance_map
